titleInfo.title: HAYMAN v. COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER THAT THE PETITION UNDER 28 U.S.C. SECTION 2254 FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS FILED ON FEBRUARY 25, 2008 IS DISMISSED WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO THE FILING OF A PETITION ON THE APPROPRIATE FORM IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE VIEWS EXPRESSED IN THE ACCOMPANYING MEMORANDUM. IF AN AMENDED PETITION IS FILED, THE ORIGINAL PETITION HEREIN DISMISSED MAY REMAIN ON FILE AS CONSTITUTING A BRIEF IN SUPPORT OF THE APPLICATION. UNLESS AN AMENDED PETITION IS FILED WITHIN 30 DAYS THIS ACTION WILL BE DISMISSED WITH PREJUDICE.. SIGNED BY HONORABLE JOHN P. FULLAM ON 3/10/08. 3/11/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(lvj, )

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 2:08-cv-00574; HAYMAN v. COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Eastern District of Pennsylvania
extension.docketText: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER THAT THE PETITION UNDER 28 U.S.C. SECTION 2254 FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS FILED ON FEBRUARY 25, 2008 IS DISMISSED WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO THE FILING OF A PETITION ON THE APPROPRIATE FORM IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE VIEWS EXPRESSED IN THE ACCOMPANYING MEMORANDUM. IF AN AMENDED PETITION IS FILED, THE ORIGINAL PETITION HEREIN DISMISSED MAY REMAIN ON FILE AS CONSTITUTING A BRIEF IN SUPPORT OF THE APPLICATION. UNLESS AN AMENDED PETITION IS FILED WITHIN 30 DAYS THIS ACTION WILL BE DISMISSED WITH PREJUDICE.. SIGNED BY HONORABLE JOHN P. FULLAM ON 3/10/08. 3/11/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(lvj, )

titleInfo.title: HAYMAN v. COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA
titleInfo.subTitle: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION THAT THE PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS BE GRANTED IN PART AS TO HAYMAN'S CONVICTION UNDER THE PA. C.O.A WITH THE EXECUTION STAYED FOR 180 DAYS TO PERMIT THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA TO VACATE THE CONVICTION AND RE-SENTENCE HAYMAN ACCORDINGLY AND DENIED IN PART WITH PREJUDICE AS TO HIS UNTIMELY CLAIMS. OBJECTIONS TO R&R DUE BY 12/17/2008. SIGNED BY MAGISTRATE JUDGE TIMOTHY R. RICE ON 11/25/08. 11/26/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED AND E-MAILED. (jpd)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 2:08-cv-00574; HAYMAN v. COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Eastern District of Pennsylvania
extension.docketText: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION THAT THE PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS BE GRANTED IN PART AS TO HAYMAN'S CONVICTION UNDER THE PA. C.O.A WITH THE EXECUTION STAYED FOR 180 DAYS TO PERMIT THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA TO VACATE THE CONVICTION AND RE-SENTENCE HAYMAN ACCORDINGLY AND DENIED IN PART WITH PREJUDICE AS TO HIS UNTIMELY CLAIMS. OBJECTIONS TO R&R DUE BY 12/17/2008. SIGNED BY MAGISTRATE JUDGE TIMOTHY R. RICE ON 11/25/08. 11/26/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED AND E-MAILED. (jpd)

titleInfo.title: HAYMAN v. COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER THAT THE REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION IS APPROVED AND ADOPTED. THE PETITION FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS IS GRANTED IN PART AS TO HAYMAN'S CONVICTION UNDER THE PA. C.O.A. WITH EXECUTION STAYED FOR 180 DAYS TO PERMIT THE COMMONWEALTH OF PA TO VACATE THE CONVICTION AND RE-SENTENCE HAYMAN; AND DENIED IN PART WITH PREJUDICE AS TO HIS UNTIMELY CLAIMS. THERE IS NO PROBABLE CAUSE TO ISSUE A CERTIRIFCATE OF APPEALABILITY. THE CLERK OF THE COURT SHALL MARK THIS CASE CLOSED FOR STATISTICAL PURPOSES.. SIGNED BY HONORABLE JOHN P. FULLAM ON 2/9/09. 2/9/09 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(lvj, )
